common.notFoundDescription: The page you are looking for does not exist
common.googleMapsTimeout: Google Maps API loading timeout. Please refresh the page.
common.googleMapsLoadError: Failed to load Google Maps API

map.title: NTU Food Map
map.subtitle: Explore food places near NTU
map.clickToSelectCenter: Click on a location on the map to select the search center. The system will use Google Maps restaurant information for filtering.

place.reviewsSource: Review data source: Google Places API

roulette.title: Food Roulette
roulette.subtitle: Let the wheel decide what to eat today!

features.title: Feature Usage
content: 1. Click on a location on the map to set the base point (Point A). The system will search for nearby restaurants centered on this point
2. Use the filters on the left to set search criteria: distance, rating, price, categories, etc.
3. Click on a restaurant from the filter results (Point B) to view details. The base point will not change
4. Click the "View Nearby Restaurants" button in the restaurant details to change the base point to that restaurant
5. Click the "Reset" button to clear all settings and start over

priceStandard.title: Price Level Standard
priceStandard.content: Price levels are based on Google Places API's price_level setting:

levels.1: $ - Inexpensive: Usually snacks, street vendors, etc. Average cost around NT$100 or less
levels.2: $$ - Moderate: General restaurants, cafes, etc. Average cost around NT$100-300
levels.3: $$$ - Expensive: Mid-to-high-end restaurants. Average cost around NT$300-600
levels.4: $$$$ - Very Expensive: High-end restaurants. Average cost around NT$600 or more

ratingStandard.title: Rating Standard
ratingStandard.content: Ratings come from Google Maps user reviews, ranging from 0-5 stars. The system displays average ratings and review counts

distanceStandard.title: Distance Calculation
distanceStandard.content: Distance is calculated using straight-line distance (Haversine formula) in meters or kilometers. Click "View Route" to open Google Maps and see the actual route
